title: LWC锁的问题
author: a13724082134
txt_content:
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum 能耗监控] 命令执行异常 请反馈下列信息给腐竹!
[11:20:08 INFO]: 插件名称: LWC
[11:20:08 INFO]: 异常名称: java.lang.NullPointerException
[11:20:08 INFO]: 异常说明: null
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum] [Yum 命令监控] 玩家 CONSOLE 执行 LWC 插件 lwc  命令时发生异常!
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum] 异常名称: java.lang.NullPointerException
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum] 异常说明: null
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum] 简易错误信息如下:
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum]     位于 com.griefcraft.lwc.LWCPlugin.onCommand(LWCPlugin.java:161)
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum]     位于 pw.yumc.Yum.inject.CommandInjector.onCommand(CommandInjector.java:106)
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum]     位于 org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:44)
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum]     位于 org.bukkit.command.SimpleCommandMap.dispatch(SimpleCommandMap.java:181)
[11:20:08 INFO]: [Yum]     位于 org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.dispatchCommand(CraftServer.java:740)



[11:19:25 INFO]: [LWC] Enabling LWC v4.5.0-SNAPSHOT
[11:19:25 ERROR]: Error occurred while enabling LWC v4.5.0-SNAPSHOT (Is it up to date?)
java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraint violation: when resolving method "com.griefcraft.lwc.LWC.<init>(Lcom/griefcraft/lwc/LWCPlugin;)V" the class loader (instance of org/bukkit/plugin/java/PluginClassLoader) of the current class, com/griefcraft/lwc/LWCPlugin, and the class loader (instance of org/bukkit/plugin/java/PluginClassLoader) for the method's defining class, com/griefcraft/lwc/LWC, have different Class objects for the type com/griefcraft/lwc/LWCPlugin used in the signature
        at com.griefcraft.lwc.LWCPlugin.onEnable(LWCPlugin.java:194) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:316) ~[JavaPlugin.class:1.7.10-1614.UNOFFICIAL]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:368) ~[JavaPluginLoader.class:1.7.10-1614.UNOFFICIAL]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:410) ~[SimplePluginManager.class:1.7.10-1614.UNOFFICIAL]

        at pw.yumc.Yum.managers.PluginsManager.reload(PluginsManager.java:439) ~[%5B插件管理%5DYum.jar:?]
        at pw.yumc.Yum.commands.YumCommand.reload(YumCommand.java:325) ~[%5B插件管理%5DYum.jar:?]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_102]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_102]

        at pw.yumc.Yum.commands.info.CommandInfo.lambda$execute$0(CommandInfo.java:136) ~[%5B插件管理%5DYum.jar:?]
        at pw.yumc.Yum.commands.info.CommandInfo.execute(CommandInfo.java:146) [%5B插件管理%5DYum.jar:?]

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Ariy
replies.txt_content:
输入指令后报错 java.lang.NullPointerException
一般来说都是因为你输入了错误格式的指令，而插件又没有做长度判断
比如需要3个参数，但是你只输入了两个，插件获取第三个参数的时候就会报错NullPointerException

replies.author: a13724082134
replies.txt_content: 找到问题了，LWC需要数据库支持，数据库是个专门的软件，需要配置好，能联通才行。
